DOC.brief_title: Watching Live VIA/VILI Examinations Digital Screen May Reduce Patients ' Anxiety
DOC.detailed_description: The study take place District Dschang , Cameroon . Women age 30 49 year , address undergo pelvic examination VIA VILI , invited participate . Throughout examination , one part woman underwent routine VIA/VILI , visual support ( control group ) , whereas part patient show picture cervix real-time digital screen ( study group ) . At end procedure , woman possibility see picture retrospectively . Randomization determine woman 's distribution two group . Their anxiety level measure ask complete Spielberg 's State Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) prior immediately procedure .
